name: Two-Button Knight
description:
A prototype of experimental two-button fighting controls.

Controls:

Player 1: 'X' and 'Z'

Player 2: '<' and '>'

Hold button - walk

Tap button - block

Double tap button - hit

Combo tap (tap both buttons in order) - dodge

Code, graphics and animation by me; sounds are Public Domain resources.

Source: https://github.com/Vladar4/ng2tbk

Nimgame 2 engine: https://vladar4.github.io/nimgame2/

Nim site: https://nim-lang.org/

P.S.: Don't forget to "chmod +x *.AppImage" to run the executable.
